title: 📘 Behind My Blog
paragraphs: I created this page to document every step I took in building the "Support My Journey" blog – a space where I share my dreams and hope to receive support from the community.

From the early days of learning how to start a blog, customising the layout, connecting PayPal, and setting up the donation button... each step was a meaningful experience. I wanted to record it as a personal reminder and share it with anyone who might be on a similar journey.
milestones: 5 July 2025 – Came up with the idea to create a personal fundraising blog.
5 July 2025 – Created the Blogspot site for fundraising equipment and searched for a theme.
6 July 2025 – Chose the blog name "Support My Journey".
6 July 2025 – Designed the website logo and favicon with blue-white tones.
6 July 2025 – Wrote the first fundraising goal post (Logitech G923).
6 July 2025 – Registered PayPal and created the donation button.
7 July 2025 – Integrated progress bar, donation history, and transparency policy.
8 July 2025 – Purchased the domain supportmyjourney.com and connected it to Blogspot. Configured DNS (Cloudflare) so Blogspot and Mail could work properly.
9 July 2025 – Added multilingual support inside posts alongside Google Translate widget, optimised for mobile.
9 July 2025 – Continued refining the in-post translation system.
10 July 2025 – Finalised the translation system and removed Google Translate due to conflicts.
10 July 2025 – Took a break... I'll continue updating with automatic donation tracking soon...
11 July 2025 – Added language support for notification pages and the About widget.
12 July 2025 – Fixed display issues on small screen devices.
13 July 2025 – Added Korean and Portuguese as new languages.

13 July 2025 – Now the website supports 8 languages (translated using AI). This increased the length of in-post HTML significantly. I decided to move all content into external JSON files (via GitHub + Cloudflare Pages) for easier management.
14 July 2025 – Faced issues with the language switcher. I standardised it into a single button with a sliding dropdown for better UI and scalability.
15 July 2025 – Optimised SEO so more people can find this site.
15 July 2025 – Testing auto-updating donation progress bar. Donation list is synced via Google Sheets, but PayPal data still needs to be manually entered due to security and simplicity reasons.
footer: Thank you for visiting this page. I hope this little journey gives you some insights or encouragement.
